name: Msitu
description:
You are the shaman of a wild tribe, crawling through haunted forest. You will have to sacrifice your body few times to reach the totem - your final destination.

How to play?

It's a classic platformer, but whenever you find an obstacle which you can not get rid of - you can sacrifice your body. You will start over, but in the spot where the offering was made, there will be new platform you can climb on. Be careful! Each time you pierce your own heart you will lose your vital forces!
